str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Lit: I dip, submerge, but specifically of ceremonial dipping; I baptize.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To be unfaithful, disbelieve, refuse belief, prove false. From apistos; to be unbelieving, i.e. disbelieve, or disobey.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To condemn, judge worthy of punishment. From kata and krino; to judge against, i.e. Sentence.
